Articles.Content:
I have heard that BD Armory can be used to increase the loading range of KSP. Is this true?

If so, how would I do it?

Edited February 3, 2015 by Engineer Of Stuff
Answered!

Did you check the BD Armory thread?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209

Press alt-B in the game then a menu appears and you can change it!

But be careful, it can cause bugs if the range is set too high, although i think most of the time it is not noticeable.
